name: 梁曉帆
objective: 此課程旨在使學生了解人類認知過程之資訊處理理論與模式以及其工作與環境之特性，並使學生能應用這些理論與模式來探討與提升整體系統之績效。
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction
Week 2: Human information processing
Week 3: Signal detection, information theory, and absolute judgment
Week 4: Attention in perception and display space
Week 5: Spatial displays
Week 6: Navigation and interaction in real and virtual environments
Week 7: Language and communications
Week 8: Memory and training
Week 9: Mid-term report
Week 10: Decision making
Week 11: Selection of action
Week 12: Manual control
Week 13: Attention, time sharing, and workload
Week 14: Stress and human error
Week 15: Complex systems, process control, and automation
Week 16: Happy new year
Week 17: Final report
Week 18: Final report
scorePolicy:
Mid-term report 30%
Assignments and class discussions 40%
Final report 30%
materials:
Engineering Psychology and Human Performance (3rd. Eds.),
Wickens and Hollands, 2000 (Prentice Hall, 滄海)
